clause.title: Gypsum-perlite or gypsum-vermiculite plaster or metal lath — beams

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: For the fire protection of steel beams with gypsum-perlite or gypsum-vermiculite on metal lath—

ol.li: the lath must be fixed at not more than 600 mm centres to steel furring channels and at least 20 mm clear of the steel; and
the thickness of the plaster must be measured from the back of the lath.
